SEARCH
Package Camp

Class CampParticipantManager

java.lang.Object
Camp.CampParticipantManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CampParticipantManager extends Object implements Serializable
The `CampParticipantManager` class manages camp participants, including attendees and committee members. It provides methods to track the number of participants, available slots, and retrieve participant lists.
See Also:
